comment.content: Honda 회사입니다. 거리가 먼 것이 흠입니다.

post.content:
I am seeking a Java/J2EE consultant with strong experience in websphere and RAD for our client based in Alliston, Ontario. This is about 20 mins from Barrie.
If you are unavailable, but know others that are interested, please ask them to call me.
The contract duration is 3 to 6 months to starts, with likely extensions.
Rate range is 50-55/- per hr, consultant must be inc.
Nitya Silveira Asset Computer Personnel 48 Yonge Street, Suite 500 (Work) 416-777 1717 ext. 357 Email: nsilveira@asset.ca web: www.asset.ca http://www.linkedin.com/connections
We are looking for a strong candidate with excellent communication skills. In addition to technical skills, the candidate should have solid experience in working with functional users and helping to design business solutions. The successful candidate will have the ability to work independently with minimal hands-on direction. Proximity to the Alliston area is a definite asset.
Musts 5 + years XP in Java J2EE. Strong Swing experience. EJB3.0. JPA/Hibernate. Struts and other new rich internet application framework (eg. GWT). Strong JMS background, specifically with WebSphere providing the service bus. Strong socket programming experience. Web service.
Design pattern. WebSphere (6.X, 7.X) IBM Rational Application Developer
Nice to have Java ME WebKit OPC Exp programming for/in a manufacturing environment. DB2 exp AIX/Unix exp Web Start Subversion/CVS
post.title: Java/J2EE consultant
